data.comment: Lucas Silva (Gremio) is not on the pitch at the moment but still receives a yellow card.
Today's referee, Dewson Fernando Freitas da Silva, has blown to start the match.
Corner awarded to Gremio.
In the minute 2, Gremio surge into the attack at Estadio Castelao but Alissonâ€™s header is off-target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Fortaleza.
Important block from the Ceara defence as Alisson fires in a strike for Gremio.
In the minute 6, Throw-in for Gremio at Estadio Castelao.
Gremio have been awarded a corner by Dewson Fernando Freitas da Silva.
Gremio's Luis Orejuela gets in a shot on goal at Estadio Castelao. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 9, Gremio awarded a free kick in their own half.
Dewson Fernando Freitas da Silva signals a Gremio throw-in in Ceara's half.
William Oliveira (Ceara) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 12, Ceara have been awarded a corner by Dewson Fernando Freitas da Silva.
Free kick for Gremio in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Gremio in Fortaleza.
In the minute 14, Cleber Bomfim (Ceara) strikes at Estadio Castelao but his header is cleared.
Throw-in Ceara.
Gremio awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 17, In Fortaleza Ceara drive forward through Leandro Carvalho. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Ceara have a dangerous throw-in.
Dewson Fernando Freitas da Silva signals a free kick to Gremio in their own half.
In the minute 19, Ceara needs to be cautious. Gremio have an attacking throw-in.
Gremio to take a throw-in in Ceara territory.
Ceara have a goal kick.
In the minute 21, Throw-in for Gremio in their own half.
Isaque of Gremio smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Cleber Bomfim for Ceara drives towards goal at Estadio Castelao. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 25, Cleber Bomfim (Ceara) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Dewson Fernando Freitas da Silva awards Gremio a goal kick.
Dewson Fernando Freitas da Silva awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 26, Ball safe as Ceara is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Ceara close to the penalty box.
Ceara's Alyson Vinicius Almeida Neves misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 27, Goal kick for Gremio at Estadio Castelao.
Isaque (Gremio) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Gremio's Isaque is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 31, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Can Gremio get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ceara's half?
Throw-in for Gremio in the half of Ceara.
In the minute 32, Dewson Fernando Freitas da Silva signals a Gremio throw-in in Ceara's half.
Dewson Fernando Freitas da Silva signals a free kick to Gremio.
Free kick for Ceara in their own half.
In the minute 35, Corner awarded to Gremio.
Gremio pushes forward through Thaciano, whose finish on goal is saved.
Gremio's Alisson goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
In the minute 37, The match at Estadio Castelao has been interrupted briefly for a check on Fernando Prass, who is down injured.
Corner awarded to Gremio.
Ceara's Fernando Prass is back in action after a slight knock.
In the minute 38, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Gremio push forward at Estadio Castelao and Isaque gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Ceara defence.
Ceara to take a throw-in in Gremio territory.
In the minute 39, Dewson Fernando Freitas da Silva signals a throw-in for Ceara, close to Gremio's area.
Ball goes out of play for a Gremio goal kick.
Throw-in for Ceara at Estadio Castelao.
In the minute 40, Free kick for Ceara in the half of Gremio.
Dewson Fernando Freitas da Silva signals a free kick to Gremio in their own half.
Free kick Ceara.
In the minute 44, Goal! Cleber Bomfim heads Ceara into a 1-0 lead.
Leandro Carvalho instrumental with a fine assist.
Ceara awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, 2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Can Ceara capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Gremio's half?
3 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Fortaleza.
In the minute 45, In Fortaleza a free kick has been awarded the away team.
The first-half has come to a close in Fortaleza.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Ceara awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Ceara in the half of Gremio.
Dewson Fernando Freitas da Silva signals a throw-in for Ceara, close to Gremio's area.
In the minute 47, Free kick for Ceara in the half of Gremio.
Ceara's Charles attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Gremio goal kick.
In the minute 49, Gremio have a goal kick.
Can Gremio get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ceara's half?
In Fortaleza a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 50, Thaciano (Gremio) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Goal kick for Ceara at Estadio Castelao.
Attention is being given to Cearaâ€™s Fernando Prass and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 52, Fernando Prass is back on the pitch.
Dewson Fernando Freitas da Silva signals a free kick to Gremio in their own half.
Can Ceara get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gremio's half?
In the minute 54, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Charles gets his shot on target but fails to score for Ceara.
Throw-in for Gremio in the half of Ceara.
In the minute 56, Free kick Gremio.
David Braz's header is off-target for Gremio.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Fortaleza.
In the minute 58, Dewson Fernando Freitas da Silva signals a free kick to Gremio.
Free kick for Ceara in their own half.
Throw-in Ceara.
In the minute 61, Gremio awarded a free kick in their own half.
Dewson Fernando Freitas da Silva awards the home team a throw-in.
Gremio have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 64, Ball safe as Ceara is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Gremio in their own half.
Isaque for Gremio drives towards goal at Estadio Castelao. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 64, Fernando Prass (Ceara) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Gremio have been awarded a corner by Dewson Fernando Freitas da Silva.
Gremio push forward at Estadio Castelao and Thaciano gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Ceara defence.
In the minute 65, Gremio have been awarded a corner by Dewson Fernando Freitas da Silva.
Thaciano (Gremio) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Dewson Fernando Freitas da Silva awards Ceara a goal kick.
In the minute 66, Ceara to take a throw-in in Gremio territory.
Manucho gets his shot on target but fails to score for Ceara.
Corner awarded to Gremio.
In the minute 71, Can Ceara capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
At Estadio Castelao, Luiz Otavio has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Leandro Carvalho (Ceara) has received a yellow card from Dewson Fernando Freitas da Silva.
In the minute 72, Thaciano levels the score at 1-1.
The away team have replaced Lucas Silva with Thiago Neves. This is the first substitution made today by Renato Gaucho.
In the minute 74, The home team replace Leandro Carvalho with Victor Jacare.
In Fortaleza a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Dewson Fernando Freitas da Silva signals a free kick to Gremio in their own half.
In the minute 77, Free kick Ceara.
Free kick for Gremio in the half of Ceara.
Renato Gaucho is making the team's second substitution at Estadio Castelao with Patrick replacing Isaque.
In the minute 82, Guto Ferreira (Ceara) is making a second substitution, with Fabinho replacing William Oliveira.
Dewson Fernando Freitas da Silva signals a free kick to Gremio.
Dewson Fernando Freitas da Silva signals a Gremio throw-in in Ceara's half.
In the minute 85, Ball goes out of play for a Gremio goal kick.
Ceara awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Bergson is on a sub for Manucho for Ceara.
In the minute 87, Rafael Sobis is replacing Cleber Bomfim for the home team.
Eduardo is replacing Samuel Xavier for Ceara at Estadio Castelao.
Ceara to take a throw-in in Gremio territory.
Can Ceara get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gremio's half?
In the minute 88, Renato Gaucho (Gremio) is making a third substitution, with Ruan replacing Thaciano.
Free kick for Gremio in their own half.
Dewson Fernando Freitas da Silva signals a Ceara throw-in in Gremio's half.
Throw-in for Gremio at Estadio Castelao.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 6 minutes of added time.
Throw-in for Gremio in the half of Ceara.
In Fortaleza a free kick has been awarded the away team.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Gremio to take a throw-in in Ceara territory.
Throw-in for Gremio close to the penalty box.
Throw-in high up the field for Gremio in Fortaleza.
Ceara awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ceara are coming forward and Victor Jacare gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Gremio at Estadio Castelao.
Can Ceara get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gremio's half?
Free kick Ceara.
The match has come to a close in Fortaleza. The final score is 1-1.
